category: Public Architectural Review Committee Regulations/Article 7 (Duties of Committee Members)
contents: Article 7 (Duties of members) ① The chairperson represents the committee and supervises its work. ② The vice-chairperson is appointed by the chairperson, assists the chairperson, and performs the duties on behalf of the chairperson if the chairperson is unable to perform his/her duties due to unavoidable reasons. ③ Members attend the committee and deliberate or advise on matters related to their duties.
